subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Jason Spezza scored two goals to lead the visiting Ottawa Senators to their sixth straight win, 3-2 over the Boston Bruins on Tuesday in a matchup of the Eastern Conference’s top two teams.
snippet: Jason Spezza scored two goals to lead the visiting Ottawa Senators to their sixth straight win, 3-2 over the Boston Bruins on Tuesday in a matchup of the Eastern Conference’s top two teams.
